Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the photograph by stating that scientists are stumped by it and some believe it shows "the gates of heaven."
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photograph is actually a piece of digital artwork created by Adam Ferriss based on a 2011 image taken by the European Southern Observatory.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that the photograph shows "the gates of heaven."
